name: osrm-rest-client
description: REST client for OSRM v5, the Open Street Map routing service. Supports async, promises or regular callbacks.

scripts.patch-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version patch --force -m "Patch release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version minor --force -m "Minor release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version major --force -m "Major release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)
